item.title: Flight Deck Window Heater Systems (No. 1 & No. 2) – Freighter without Draw-Through Smoke Detection System – F/O's Inoperative

remarks.para: One window heater system (No. 1 or No. 2) may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Flight Deck Vent Fan is operative, and

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 2.
Operations into known or forecast icing conditions is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard on Anti-Ice Rain Removal Panel (P5): "#____ WINDOW HT SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
